nodes.text: A swooper (also swooptroop, swoop biker, swoop racer, swoop troop, swoop trooper, or swoop jockey) was an individual who rode a swoop. Around the time of the Galactic Civil War, most swoopers were criminals and members of swoop gangs. Around 4000 years earlier, swoop racing was a popular sport galaxy-wide, and particularly successful swoopers would rise to celebrity status.
